name: reverse_words
description: Reverses the order of words in a sentence. Optionally allows splitting by a custom delimiter, excluding specific words, and preserving the case of each word.

sentence.description: The input sentence whose words will be reversed.

split_by.description: The delimiter to split words by. Default is a space.

exclude.description: A list of words to exclude from reversal. These words will remain in their original position.

preserve_case.description: If True, preserves the original case of the words. Default is True.
